alert.note: Alert for Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:38PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Kenton, or 32 miles northwest of Boise City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
